languages.text: "Надлежит вынести Суждение. Надлежит ли секрету Эсхатоса существовать, или он должен быть отвергнут, как ложный путь".
"A Judgement must be passed. Should the secret of Eschatos exist or be shunned as a false path?"
languages.original_text: "Надлежит вынести Суждение. Надлежит ли секрету Эсхатоса существовать, или он должен быть отвергнут, как ложный путь".

traits.locale_text: "A Judgement must be passed. Whether the secret of Eschatos ought to exist, or ought to be shunned as a false path."
"A Judgement must be passed. Whether the secret of Eschatos ought to exist, or ought to be shunned as a false path."
"A Judgement must be passed. Should the secret of Eschatos exist or be shunned as a false path?"
"A Judgement must be passed. Should the secret of Eschatos exist or be shunned as a false path?"
"A Judgement must be passed. Should the secret of Eschatos exist or be shunned as a false path?"
"A Judgement must be passed. Should the secret of Eschatos exist or be shunned as a false path?"

languages.text: 「審判を通過しなくてはならない。エスカトの秘密は存在すべきか、誤った道として避けられるべきものか？」
languages.original_text: "A Judgement must be passed. Should the secret of Eschatos exist or be shunned as a false path?"

traits.locale_text: 「審判を通過しなくてはならない。エスカトの秘密は存在すべきか、誤った道として避けられるべきものか？」

languages.text: “必须做出判断。终焉审判的秘密应该继续存在，还是应当视为错误的道路进行回避？”
languages.original_text: "A Judgement must be passed. Should the secret of Eschatos exist or be shunned as a false path?"

traits.locale_text: “必须做出判断。终焉审判的秘密应该继续存在，还是应当视为错误的道路进行回避？”

languages.text: « Un jugement doit être rendu. Le secret d'Eschatos doit-il exister ou doit-il être considéré comme un blasphème et éliminé ? »
languages.original_text: "A Judgement must be passed. Should the secret of Eschatos exist or be shunned as a false path?"

traits.locale_text: « Un jugement doit être rendu. Le secret d'Eschatos doit-il exister ou doit-il être considéré comme un blasphème et éliminé ? »

languages.text: «Es necesario emitir un Juicio: ¿el secreto de Eschatos debería existir o rechazarse como una opción errónea?».
languages.original_text: "A Judgement must be passed. Should the secret of Eschatos exist or be shunned as a false path?"

traits.locale_text: «Es necesario emitir un Juicio: ¿el secreto de Eschatos debería existir o rechazarse como una opción errónea?».

languages.text: "Es muss ein Urteil gefällt werden. Sollte das Geheimnis von Eschatos existieren oder als falscher Pfad gemieden werden?"
languages.original_text: "A Judgement must be passed. Should the secret of Eschatos exist or be shunned as a false path?"

traits.locale_text: "Es muss ein Urteil gefällt werden. Sollte das Geheimnis von Eschatos existieren oder als falscher Pfad gemieden werden?"

languages.text: "Bir Hüküm verilmeli. Eskatos'un sırrı var olmalı mı yoksa yanlış bir yol addedilerek ondan sakınılmalı mı?"
languages.original_text: "A Judgement must be passed. Should the secret of Eschatos exist or be shunned as a false path?"

traits.locale_text: "Bir Hüküm verilmeli. Eschatos'un sırrı var olmalı mı, yoksa yanlış bir yol addedilerek ondan sakınılmalı mı?"
